properties.areaDesc: Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook; Southern Piscataquis; Central Piscataquis; Northern Piscataquis; Southern Penobscot
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 3:04PM EST until February 19 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Caribou ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5
inches expected.

* WHERE...Portions of Central Highlands, Far Northern, North
Woods and Penobscot Valley Maine.

* WHEN...From 1 PM Tuesday to midnight EST Tuesday night.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy
blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and cause
localized hazardous travel. The hazardous conditions could
impact the evening commute.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads
and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to
newengland511.org.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TUESDAY TO MIDNIGHT EST TUESDAY NIGHT
